name: Mobspawn
description:
Absorb your surroundings and repurpose them as projectiles. Ascend the floors of Mobspawn Co in this top-down roguelike shooter.

  • Ascend the floors of Mobspawn in this procedurally generated, isometric, twin-stick shooter.

  • The ever out-of-touch CEO has laid off all staff in favor of traditional video game mobs.

  • Your vacuum unit allows you to repurpose your surroundings as projectiles.

  • Improve your abilities with whatever you can find. you'll need it.
